miniapp.name: FX Remit
miniapp.subtitle: Cross-border payments
miniapp.description: Send money to 15 countries with ultra-low 1.5 percent fees, lightning-fast settlements and enterprise-grade security. Powered by Celo blockchain and Mento Protocol.
miniapp.ogDescription: Send money to 15 countries with ultra-low 1.5 percent fees and lightning-fast settlements.
